nodes.text: The Revenant Speeder was a type of speeder bike utilized by the Lok Revenants. It was also referred to as the Pirate Speeder Bike.

The Revenant Speeder was a repulsorcraft that was propelled by two large engines. A laser cannon turret was mounted on the top near the rear of the craft. It was manned by a gunner who sat in an unenclosed seat.

Revenant Speeders were used by the Revenants at the First Battle of Lok; first to escort a pirate freighter, and later to patrol the area around Nym's Base. During the battle, Jinkins was nearly killed in one of these bikes, but was saved by Nym in his Havoc. Ten years later, three of these speeder bikes were used by the pirates at the Second Battle of Lok. Sol Sixxa used one to set explosives on a door to Nym's Base, then under control of the Trade Federation.
